ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup white wine, or more to taste
4 (3 ounce) fillets amberjack, dark brown vein removed
1 tablespoon mayonnaise, or more to taste
2 teaspoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®), or to taste

cookingTips: Remove the dark vein along the center line for milder flavor
Baste fish with wine mixture halfway through cooking to keep flesh moist
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Delicate white fish requires careful handling. How will you cook the amberjack until just opaque while maintaining its tender texture?
